QuestData.Title: Enemy Booty
QuestData.Description: When you fight the enemy, gather the scraps of their armor and bring them to me. I'll use those scraps to make armor for our own troops!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 20 Armor Scraps to Smith Regzar in Frostwolf Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: How goes the hunting, $N. Do you have any armor scraps for me?
QuestData.RewardText: These will do nicely. I'll melt them down and patch them up and you'll never know they came from those Stormpike cowards!$B$BThanks, $N. And let me polish up that armor of yours...
